summary: An articulate and strong communicator who has a positive mindset, along with dedication and motivation required to succeed in a busy administrative department. Possessing a in-depth knowledge of administrative processes and procedures and a proven track record of providing great support to employees and managers. Easy going by nature and being able to work both individually and in teams, providing a comprehensive administrative support to day-to-day operations in human resources and general affairs departments.

profile_positions.description: Eurus Energy develops, invests in and operates renewable energy projects worldwide, with a focus on onshore wind and photovoltaic projects. We have been expanding our clean energy portfolio ever since our first wind project in California’s Mojave Desert in the late 1980s. We actively source new projects to develop with local partners in various parts of the world. Eurus Energy Europe B.V. is a part of Eurus Energy Holdings Corporation.
profile_positions.title: HR-GA Assistant
Global Office Manager HR & Finance Support
HR-GA Assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Stored, retrieved and manipulated employee data
- Organized files following strict guidelines from Human Resource Manager
- Identified missing data and requested information from employees in order to finalize their digital profiles
- Generated active/close employee records by retrieving over 300 confidential employee binders from storage
- Produced over 300 electronical profiles by inputting accurate data within the Cloud
profile_positions.title: Administrative worker

profile_positions.description:
- Administered daily revenue, oversaw sales and inventory
- Increased total revenue by 25% and lowered staff turnover by offering support and training
- Encouraged open and professional team attitudes focused on customer satisfaction
- Collaborated with other managers to enhance the efficiency and productivity of the company
- Organized team building outings and strengthened team bond
- Improved customer flow management by rearranging the bar's layout
- Coordinated with the cleaning and maintenance staff to ensure the bar is presented in top conditions
- Analyzed stock in line with fluctuating levels of business, minimizing waste, seeking ways to constantly reduce costs and improve operational standards
- Trained in employment law, health and safety, food safety, alcohol licensing, first aid and fire safety reduce costs and improve operational standards.
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Developed exceptional product knowledge that guaranteed customer's satisfaction
- Discovered opportunities to generate increased revenue and doubled sales of expensive items while providing a superior customer service
- Mastered working in a fast paced environment with over 2000 units sold per day
profile_positions.title: Bartender

volunteer_experiences.description:
Teacher Assistant in Norwegian Course 1 for adult immigrants - classroom of circa 30 students 

- Welcomed students and ensured all building exits are closed after each break and class
- Provided drinks and snacks to students and restocked when necessary
- Assisted the teacher during class in various tasks such as grading homework and tests, reading out loud, drafting practical exercises, attending learning games
- Assisted students practicing the Norwegian language and offering extensive support to adult immigrants with learning disabilities
- Offered support to students who experienced culture shock, helping them understand the Norwegian life style and traditions
